input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Kurt Adler 9.25' LED Lighted Iridescent Tinsel Christmas Garland with Warm White Lights'
  - Name='Collections Etc Lighted Berry-Beaded Holiday Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Seasonal 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6' x 10" Pre-Lit Decorated Black Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Cool White'
  - Name='Worth Imports Indoor Juniper Pine Artificial Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Flocked Victoria Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Puleo International 20-ft. Artificial Spruce Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9' Pre-Lit Oak Creek Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Tinsel Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Puleo 6ft x 20in Pre-Lit LED Christmas Twig Artificial Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Flocked Twig Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 9.25' LED Lighted Iridescent Tinsel Christmas Garland with Warm White Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland with warm lights but made of iridescent tinsel, a different material and silhouette than pine/cashmere branch garland, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Collections Etc Lighted Berry-Beaded Holiday Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted holiday garland but focused on berry-beaded design, likely different construction and silhouette than pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Seasonal 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length, pre-lit artificial garland with Noble Fir type close to reference pine type, likely similar construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' x 10" Pre-Lit Decorated Black Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Cool White
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland but shorter length (6 ft) and cool white lights instead of warm white; still similar product category and use though.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Worth Imports Indoor Juniper Pine Artificial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland but indoor only, no mention of pre-lit or length, juniper pine rather than Norwood fir, less similar but within garland category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Flocked Victoria Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland of similar length and type, though 'flocked' might alter appearance; still quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, similar product type but spruce instead of fir/pine, no mention of lights or pre-lit, slightly different silhouette.
Artificial spruce garland but much longer (20 ft), no mention of lighting, different size and foliage type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9' Pre-Lit Oak Creek Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product: pre-lit pine garland of 9 feet length, used for Christmas decoration with similar features.
Lighted and faux pine garland, close in length (9 feet = 108 inches), likely similar core features though less detail in name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Tinsel Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit but tinsel material differs greatly from pine branch; different silhouette and texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 6ft x 20in Pre-Lit LED Christmas Twig Artificial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter, pre-lit twig garland which is similar as artificial and lighted but likely differing visual style and size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Flocked Twig Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial twig garland but different silhouette from pine branch garland, flocked finish adds difference.
